sen.e: His father, Emperor Nijo tried to rule the government directly and opposed against Go-Shirakawa, he stopped Go-Shirakawa's cloister government by saying him laid a scheme to let half younger brother, Prince Norihito enthrone, and Norihito's uncle, TAIRA no Tokitada was sentenced to deportation, TAIRA no Norimori, FUJIWARA no Narichika and FUJIWARA no Nobutaka lost their positions.
